short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds relevant labels to comments and prevents changing the default merge strategy of a pull request.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Insights Lab is a browser extension designed specifically for Bitbucket users, aiming to improve and streamline the pull request review process. It adds relevant labels to comments, allowing better organization and communication among team members. Additionally, it prevents changing the default merge strategy of a pull request, ensuring a consistent workflow. Simplify your team's collaboration and make your Bitbucket experience more efficient with this useful extension.

1.1.0 | 2023-04-18
Release

1.1.1 | 2023-05-26
Bugfixes
- Updated HTML query selector due to Bitbucket's HTML structure changes, which prevents the evaluation of null variables and avoids causing blocking errors.
- Handled the case of deleted comments, which previously stopped the extension from working properly.

1.1.2 | 2023-10-10
Bugfixes
- Fixed HTML query selectors and general inconsistencies.
- Unlabeled comments made before the release date are no longer censored.
- Comment buttons (Reply, Resolve, Edit...) are now rendered correctly, respecting comment decorations. e.g. It is not possible to create an issue for a non-blocking comment.

Features
- Logs might be displayed in the user's console, both at startup and on error.
- All types of selectors are stored on a remote server, making it much easier and faster to fix an HTML selector when Bitbucket changes its structure.

TODOs
- Enable extension for side-by-side and entire views (these options are available in each file's horizontal kebab menu).
